definition: paraphernalia of a guard of honor
to perform one's job/attendant/job/duties/(respectful appellation for the addressee) you/your Excellency/(Church) deacon

sentences.english: If there is only one deacon , he takes his place at the right of the celebrant.
sentences.chinese: 如果只有一個執事，他考慮他的位置在右邊的禮。

sentences.english: C11.09 The Congregation Council shall submit a comprehensive report to this congregation at the annual meeting.
sentences.chinese: 本堂會執事會當每年在會員大會中提出工作報告。

sentences.english: The Church Board shall consult all Ministry Committees regarding the recommended candidate.
sentences.chinese: 教會執事會必須與所有堂務委員會洽商經推薦的人選。

sentences.english: Likewise as touching a Presbyter and a Deacon.
Pray the election for new deacons on next Sunday (12/6).
The undertaker's men will come and lift the coffin; there will be nothing in it.
sentences.chinese: 殯儀執事們來了，擡起那棺材，裏面卻沒有東西。

sentences.english: However, such action must be passed by a two - thirds majority vote of the entire existing Board.
sentences.chinese: 不過，事先需要經執事會三分之二多數票通過。

sentences.english: Or we may recognize the elders and deacons.
sentences.chinese: 我們或許知道長老和執事的名字。

sentences.english: You know Deacon Hawkins isn't asking somebody every day to go sleighing with him.
sentences.chinese: 你知道執事霍金斯的要求是每天都會跟他去雪橇。

sentences.english: Dn. M. G. Samuel of Ambatur Church (who has rested in Christ) was a convert from Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 安巴都教會已故的撒母耳執事原本是信奉印度教的。

sentences.english: There is not among them an esquire, saving the unlettered magistrate.
sentences.chinese: 他們當中除了那個目不識丁的執事，沒有一個鄉紳。

sentences.english: C11.08 The Congregation Council shall be responsible for the appointment of the salaried lay workers of this congregation.
sentences.chinese: 本堂會執事會將負責召請聘用受薪非按立的員工。

sentences.english: Submit to church treasurer. The turn-around time is about a week.
sentences.chinese: 擲交出納執事，約一週後可領取支票。

sentences.english: The deacons want to help you.
I declare! so the deacon's goin' to try his hand on Old Baldy, eh?
sentences.chinese: 我敢說，執事打算要衝老禿子下手了，嗯？

sentences.english: The pastoral search committee shall recommend candidates to the Church Board.
sentences.chinese: 聘牧委員會當向執事會推薦牧師候選人。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
head rope of a fishing net/guiding principle/key link/class (taxonomy)/outline/program
to reconcile/to mediate/to bring warring parties to agreement/to arbitrate
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
